ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson does as instructed and gets back into robot mode.  Uproar does the same, next to his leader.  He grins back at him.  Is it me or did I see you give

Tucson does as instructed and gets back into robot mode.  Uproar does the s=
ame, next to his leader.  He grins back at him.

" Is it me or did I see yo=
u give Talon that little rub back there?  No worries, it'll be nice ta have=
 another family aboard.  It'll make us all the more unified."

Tucson nods.=


" I would like very much to start a family, but that also has to be what =
Talon wants."

He looks to Talon with soft eyes.

" I would never do anythi=
ng that she wouldnt want me to do, unless she requests it."

Uproar smiles.=


" I understand.  I'd be the same way.   So we're gonna go back ta Cybertr=
on huh?  I can't even remember what it looks like, and what it's gonna look=
 like when we get back....   AAACHOO!  Sorry."

Tucson sighs.

" I don't re=
member much of it myself.  My memories were stolen from me, by Cyclonus, ac=
cording to Straightshot, who actually saw him take the shot. "

He then tur=
ns to Lord Elder and Leo Prime.

" if I could have anything returned to me,=
 I would much rather have had my memories returned, rather than my sight.  =
I can still love Talon even without my eyes and see her inner beauty throug=
h my spark, but I can never remember those before me as I wish to remember =
them. It's rather surprising that one of my memories did come back.. But th=
ose I have lost, what happened to them?  Perhaps returning home may help me=
 to regain a portion of what I lost.  But I will be sure to hold onto these=
 new memories and guard them with my own spark."

Nightshift growls as he t=
ries to lick at the strange growth on his leg.  Quickstride turns his head =
away from his leg.

" Hey stop that!  No, bad kitty!"

Nightshift grunts.

=
" I know, but it itches. I sure hope the guys can get this off me, it's wor=
se than having fleas."

Local artist who specializes in illustration, using=
 traditional and digital media.  

I also specialize in hand made crafts.  =
Great for any occasion!  

Need a great gift idea that is original?  No pro=
blem!  Email me at this address and we will talk.

e overlooked the
> > presence of a fellow Maximal. Normally as part of our =
team, you should have had
> > some means of capturing a fellow comrade's si=
gnature and made the determination
> > that he or she is still within close=
 proximity. But what you're saying contradicts that.
> > Anyway, I will tal=
k to you later, first, all of us need treatment, if we're to rejoin the
> >=
 forces."
> >

p to him.

got now. Slaag, if it's true
> > that we got a mole on board, we're done fo=
r. But it looks like the big boss kinda knows

t Tucson's body language, his tail tapp'n the ground, his
> > stiff gait, a=
nd that little snarl on the snout. He does that when he smells someth'n tha=
t
> > doesn't seem right."
> >

> > " I thi=
nk it's best to keep an eye on Legacy. Tell me if you see any suspicious
> =
> behavior on his part. If you do, don't let him suspect that you know anyt=
hing. Just play
> > along, observe and relay back to me what you observe. T=
hen together with Leo
> > Prime, we can decide what action may need to be d=
one. I think this is long overdue. "
> >
> > He salutes Rodimus and heads t=
o the med bay.
>

> "Agreed." RODIMUS said as he glanced at LEGA=
CY and then back at
> TUCSON, "We need to keep an optic on him. I have not =
had a chance to
> know him well, perhaps Lord Elder can help you with detai=
ls about him,
> he has been around him the longest."
> 
> Meanwhile SANTON,=
 BUMP and LEGACY have all made their way to the medical bay.
> 
> If LEGACY=
 is the least bit uncomfortable with all the optics watching
> him and all =
the suspicious looks being directed his way there is not a
> shred of it vi=
sable on his cold faceplate. Instead he is his typical
> efficient self as =
he walked over to a console and began to feed in
> information.
> 
> "If yo=
u two will get up on the medical beds." SANTON said, "We can see
> if we ca=
n get this over with as fast as possible."
>

ooking at LEGACY in a speculative manner
> saying nothing.

IMAL on the other hand walked back away from the ARK and
> gestured to RAT =
TRAP, WINDLORD and PERCEPTOR, "Okay, Windlord and
> Perceptor, you two dire=
ct us to where you saw the humans and let's see
> what we can find."
